name: funimaex

stmt.origin: mpan2(wfun(c0), wcel(cima(c0, c1), universe), wcel(c1, universe))

body.origin:
|- wi(wfun(c0), wcel(cima(c0, c1), universe))
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, universe)), wcel(cima(c0, c1), universe))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wfun(c0), wcel(cima(c0, c1), universe))
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, universe)), wcel(cima(c0, c1), universe))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wfun(c0), wcel(c1, universe)), wcel(cima(c0, c1), universe))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wfun(c0), wcel(cima(c0, c1), universe))
-| wcel(c1, universe)

comment: The image of a set under any function is also a set. Equivalent of Axiom of Replacement ~ ax-rep . Axiom 39(vi) of [Quine] p. 284. Compare Exercise 9 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 29. (Contributed by NM, 17-Nov-2002.)
